title: Closing audit letters
context: [ยง231-10.5] Closing audit letters. At the conclusion of a tax audit, the department shall provide to the taxpayer a closing audit letter that shall confirm in writing the department&rsquo;s position on each issue considered in the audit, and which shall provide guidance on how the taxpayer may report such issues for post audit years.
